query: WITH entities AS (SELECT credit_facility_id, id FROM core_obligation_installments WHERE ((credit_facility_id = $1) AND (COALESCE(id < $3, true))) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $4 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_obligation_installment_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
